Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1978...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Toledo on 4/1/1978 (Going to TOL: LF H. Vega. Going to PIT: 1B M. Hu)...
Injured on 5/14/1979 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Traded from Toledo to Pittsburgh on 2/19/1985 (Going to PIT: LF H. Vega. Going to TOL: SS A. Urias)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1985, off Florencio Lopez (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/1985, off Miguel Lopez (TOL)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
